attributes.action: Make it clear to the Church of England and the Islamic Community that we will never allow any aspect of Sharia law to operate in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A Church of England official's comment about allowing Muslims in Britain to adopt aspects of Sharia law in this country is a terrifying example of the gradual degradation of the Church of England and of this nation, too. Let's stand up for hard-won British values and laws. This is not negotiable. Too much is at stake.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions on entirely hypothetical situations.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
